T02D3041:83a-0: @83a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3041:83a-1: klu rnams kyi gdon las grol bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D3041:83a-2: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin du bris la /
T02D3041:83a-3: gtso bo'i bum pa la las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsangs la /
T02D3041:83a-4: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag / de nas bag
T02D3041:83a-5: zan la klu chen po brgyad kyi gzugs sor bzhi
T02D3041:83a-6: pa thal mo sbyar ba tshon gyis bsgyur te /
T02D3041:83a-7: so so'i gnas su bum pa la kha bstan la gzhag go //
T02D3041:83a-8: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su sbrul nag po brgyad /
T02D3041:83a-21: sgo bzhir shar du stag skya bo /
T02D3041:83a-23: nub tu ba lang gi mgo can /
T02D3041:83a-24: byang du byi la'i mgo can phyogs kyi kha dog dang mthun pa'o //
T02D3041:83a-25: mu khyud kyi steng du klu brgyad kyi chung ma ral pa can mdog khra bo brgyad gzhag go //
T02D3041:83a-26: mu ran rnams su byol song gi gzugs sna tshogs la tshon sna tshogs pas bsgyur la gzhag go //
T02D3041:83a-27: srog chags de dag ni gtso bo la bka' nyan pa'i tshul gyis blta'o //
T02D3041:83a-28: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams rnams su kham phor gtsang ma'am /
T02D3041:83b-0: rin po che'i snod du @83b ba dmar mo'i 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang /
T02D3041:83b-4: na ga ge sar la sogs pa'i klu sman sna tshogs blugs te /
T02D3041:83b-5: dar ljang gus phub la gzhag go //
T02D3041:83b-6: klu'i gtor ma nyi shu rtsa gcig phyogs gtor dang /
T02D3041:83b-7: bgegs gtor kyang gzhan dang mthun par bsag go //
T02D3041:83b-8: rin po che dang bal tshon sna tshogs pa yang sobs su 'bul lo //
T02D3041:83b-9: de nas dza: h'um bam ho: sa klu rnams gzugs brnyan la bcug ste de dag mchod par bya'o //
T02D3041:83b-10: me long gi nang du gzugs brnyan gsal bar byas la /
T02D3041:83b-11: nad pa'i lus la rma byas bya bas te ;
T02D3041:83b-12: me long gi gzugs brnyan dang dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas la /
T02D3041:83b-13: 'o ma sbreng zhing skabs su dug 'don pa'i cho ga bya'o //
T02D3041:83b-15: snying po shan tu bsdus pa'i gsham la /
T02D3041:83b-16: klu brgyad kyi snying po bzlas so //
T02D3041:83b-17: de ltar brgya song zhing klu rnams la sman dbul ba ni /
T02D3041:83b-18: kva ya klu chen po brgyad po tshur nyon dang //
T02D3041:83b-19: nga ni rdo rje rnam 'joms te //
T02D3041:83b-20: rigs sngags grub pas yas dor te //
T02D3041:83b-21: klu rnams nga yi bka' la nyon //
T02D3041:83b-22: nga yi bka' la mi nyan na //
T02D3041:83b-24: klu yi snying la me sbar nas //
T02D3041:83b-25: mgo lus bye mas sreg par byed //
T02D3041:83b-26: de bas nga yi bka' nyon cig / h'um gdug pa'i nad rnams gdon pa'i phyir //
T02D3041:83b-27: klu rgyal rnams la mchod par 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-28: n'a ga ge sar bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-29: n'a ga pus pa'i bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-30: rgya mtsho lbu pa'i bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-31: gla gor zho zha'i bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-32: mkhal ma zho sha'i bdud rtsi 'bul//
T02D3041:83b-33: snying zho sha yi bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-34: pu shel tse yi bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-36: mkhal sran bre yi bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-37: cu gang dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-38: gur kum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-39: 'o ma bu dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-40: dbang po lag pa'i bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-41: chu srin sder mo'i bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-42: rdo rgyus dkar po'i bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-43: thal ka rdo rje'i bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-44: dkar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-45: mngar gsum dag gi bdud rtsi 'bul //
T02D3041:83b-46: zhes brjod cing klu rnams kyi snying po brgya tshar re bzlas /
T02D3041:83b-47: de nas klu gso ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D3041:84a-2: klu yi glo nad sos gyur cig / n'a ga pur pa'i sman phul pas //
T02D3041:84a-3: klu yi mchin nad sos gyur cig / rgya mtsho lpu ba'i sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-4: klu yi dbugs nad sos gyur cig / gla gor zho sha'i sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-5: klu yi klad nad sos gyur cig /
T02D3041:84a-6: mkhal ma zho sha'i bdud rtsi yis //
T02D3041:84a-7: klu yi mkhal nad sos gyur cig / snying zho sha yi sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-8: klu yi snying nad sos gyur cig / pu shel tse yi sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-9: klu yi skra nad sos gyur cig / kanda ka ri'i sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-10: klu yi rkang nad sos gyur cig / mkhal sram za po'i sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-11: klu yi kha nad sos gyur cig / cu gang dkar po'i sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-12: klu yi so nad sos gyur cig / gur gum dag gi sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-13: klu yi rgyu nad sos gyur cig /'o ma bu dag gi sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-14: klu yi khong nad sos gyur cig / dbang po lag pa'i sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-15: klu yi yan lag sos gyur cig / chu srin sder mo'i sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-16: klu yi sems nad sos gyur cig / rdo rgyus dkar po'i sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-17: klu yi chu rgyus nyams pa sos gyur cig / thal ka rdo rje'i sman phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-18: klu yi gsang nad sos gyur cig / dkar gsum bdud rtsi phul ba yis //
T02D3041:84a-19: klu yi gzim dang nyams pa sos gyur cig / mngar gsum bdud rtsi phul ba yis //
T02D3041:84a-20: klu rnams lus shed rdzogs gyur cig / ces sman gyis lus nad rnams bsal nas /
T02D3041:84a-21: klu'i dug dbyung zhing gdon las dgrol ba'i cho ga ni /
T02D3041:84a-22: me long gi dkyil 'khor la rtsi mchod 'bul ba ni /
T02D3041:84a-23: rma byas dug bya ba cing 'di skad do //
T02D3041:84a-24: n'a ga ge sar sman gyi mchog / n'a ga ge sar 'di phul bas //
T02D3041:84a-25: klu yi nad rnams sos gyur cig / klu yi nad rnams sos pa bzhin //
T02D3041:84a-26: mi yi nad rnams sos gyur cig / klu yi nad rnams sos nas kyang //
T02D3041:84a-27: klu rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig / klu rnams mdangs dang ldan nas kyang //
T02D3041:84a-28: mi rnams mdangs dang ldan gyur cig / klu rnams mdangs dang ldan nas kyang //
T02D3041:84a-29: klu yi dug rnams phyir phyung shig / dug 'di sa yi nang du song //
T02D3041:84a-30: reg pa'i dug rnams phyir phyung shig / kha rlangs
T02D3041:84b-0: dug rnams phyir @84b phyung shig / dug rnams sa
T02D3041:84b-2: de bzhin chu dang me dang rlung //
T02D3041:84b-3: 'byung ba bzhi la dug song cig / ces brjod
T02D3041:84b-4: cing phud phud ces dug gi rlangs pa sngon dmar
T02D3041:84b-5: du 'byung zhing / rma byas bya bas la me long la bstim mo //
T02D3041:84b-6: sman kun la tshig de kun sbyar /
T02D3041:84b-7: de ltar snying po stong tshar zhing de ltar gdon dgrol gyi cho ga tshig tu brjod cing /
T02D3041:84b-9: nad pa'i lus mgo mjug tu smyag shad kyi lcug ma'am /
T02D3041:84b-10: bal po se'u'i lcug mas brdeg go //
T02D3041:84b-11: rma dang shub yod pa rnams la khrus bya'o //
T02D3041:84b-12: de nas klu rnams la gtor ma rgya chen po gtang ngo //
T02D3041:84b-13: bgegs dang phyogs skyong rnams la yang gtor ma gtang ngo //
T02D3041:84b-14: de nas dkyil 'khor gzugs dang bcas pa de chu klung chen po'am /
T02D3041:84b-15: yang na sa'i gter du sba'o //
T02D3041:84b-16: de nas tshe dbang bskur zhing bkra shis gsol /
T02D3041:84b-17: khrus bya zhing snying po rgyas bsdus gang mos la brgya rtsa brgyad zlos su gzhug go //
T02D3041:84b-18: mi shigs pa lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la gzhag go //
T02D3041:84b-19: klu'i gdon las grol bar byed pa sbrul pa 'dzin bsad pa zhes bya ba /
